message.subject: Sun Microsystems
message.content:
M1.1. Ken Lay put a call in today to Scott McNealy.
[Inform: Ken Lay called CEO of Sun Microsystems today]
M1.2. His office called back to find
out what specific bill included direct access.
[Inform: Scott McNealy's office called back to see what specfic bill included direct access]
M1.3. When I called back, they put
me in touch with Mavis Toscano, who's in Sun Microsystems' state and local
government affairs office.
[Inform: when Karen called back, she was put in touch with Mavis, in Sun's state and local gov't affairs office]
M1.4. She's Scott's point person on public policy, and
she's been working on the energy issue.
[Inform: Mavis is Scott's point person on public policy and has been working on energy issue]
M1.5. Mavis had done some checking and no
one had heard anything about direct access.
[Inform: Mavis did some checking and no one had heard anything about direct access]
M1.6. Sun is active in three main trade associations: the Chamber, the American
Electronics Association (AEA) and Technet.
[Inform: three main trade associations Sun is active in]
Sflink1.6
M1.7. None of those organizations said
their members were asking for direct access, but Mavis promised to put calls
in to them and get direct access on the radar screen.
[Inform: none of these organizations said their members were asking for direct access, but Mavis promised to call them and probe further]
M1.8. Although she said
they're not inclined to send letters, Mavis said she'd make some calls into
the legislators, specifically Bowen.
[Inform: Mavis said she would call legislators such as Bowen, even though they might not send letters]
M1.9. Contact info:
M1.10. Mavis Toscano
M1.11. 901 San Antonio Road
MS PAL 01-554
Palo Alto, CA 94303
M1.12. 650-336-7115
M1.13. 650-336-0835 - fax
M1.14. mavis.toscano@sun.com
[Inform: Mavis' contact information]

message.subject: Sun Microsystems
message.content:
M2.1. FYI. Lauren Ipsen at Cisco told me that she forwarded our package of
letters, etc. to the AEA.
[Inform: Lauren at Cisco told Jeff that she forwarded Jeff et al.'s package to AEA]
Blink1.6
